original_title: Pistol Pete: The Life and Times of Pete Maravich
overview: Documentary about basketball player Pete Maravich. The legend of "Pistol Pete" Maravich was born on the playgrounds of his youth, extending to the campus of Louisiana State University and culminating in a 10-year NBA career during which he was named one of the League's 50 greatest players of all time.
title: Pistol Pete: The Life and Times of Pete Maravich
